wasara 1910 di arambai kanishta shishyabhata puhunuwa aarambha kara athi athara ewak patan kandawuru gatha wi athi bawata jathika shishyabhata balakaye ithihasaya sakshi darayi. 1981 di kanishta shishyabhata puhunuwa nawathwa athi athara athigaru janadhipathithumage sankalpayak ha garu agramathyathumage maga penwima matha 2016 warshaye di nawatha aarambha kara, 2017 warshaye di nawatha kandawuru gatha kirima aarambha karana ladi. uu. jathika nidahas dina uthsawa pelapaliya sama wasarakama pebarawari 04 dina pawathwanu labana jathika nidahas dina pelapaliya sandaha shishyabhata balakaya niyojanaya karamin shishyabhatayin 300 k ha niladharin 09 k sahabhagi we.
